column3: Not sure it makes sense adding the 0.11 release notes to the 0.10 branch ?\n
Agree with @fanquake: 0.11x release notes make not much sense in the 0.10 branch.\n

Agreed, let's not do this (in the worst case this creates N \* N pull requests/commits...) Most important is that the master branch has the historical release notes so people can find them through the github interface. Apart from that maybe the most recent release branch.\n

The 0.10.x should be included in 0.10. Releases should include the notes
for their direct ancestors.

On Thursday, October 15, 2015, Wladimir J. van der Laan <
